posts.post_content:
I am looking to acquire items about Harvard base ball from about 1865 to 1870.  Specifically photographs, cdv’s, cabinets, paper items.  Especially looking for Archibald “Archie” Bush items.
Thank you. 
Email or pm
I used to have this 1866 cdv, Bruce.  It found a new home with a board member a few years ago.
